body: If people think it is a good thing to place the tc* functions in a separate package for one GOOS/GOARCH combination, I would think it makes sense to do it for all supported GOOS/GOARCH combinations.  My question is would it be x/sys/unix/termios or x/sys/termios.  I believe Plan9 and Windows have these functions available so would think the package wouldn't go under x/sys/unix.
